location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Arrathoon and Arrakiel Constantine, merchants of Bushire to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The letter has suffered from some damage causing holes which have obscured some of the text.

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting a certificate for the state of the markets on specified dates for the supply of straw and barley to feed mules and asses.
